Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Access Request Treated
Workflow.Description:
This flow implements the process flow after a response is given to the access request made by a user for stakeholder access. Which sends an email of the response and if the response is approved triggers the Add user to tempReadWriteTeam.
Flow failure also results in the failure of the temporary stakeholder access feature offered by Review Hub. Specifically, the process that occurs after access is granted or rejected.
